title: David Defeats the Ammonites and Arameans
summary: David sends messengers to comfort Hanun, king of Ammon, but they are humiliated. War breaks out between Israel and the Ammonites, who ally with the Arameans. Joab and Abishai lead Israel to victory.

faq.question: What did Hanun do to Davidâ€™s messengers?
faq.answer: He shaved their beards and cut their clothes, insulting them.

faq.question: Who led Israel in battle?
faq.answer: Joab and his brother Abishai, with God granting them victory.
